Alias.name: Throw Fireworks!
Alias.script: mtw.al_do_rogue("vout coal;construct cusser;bqa throw cusser at sky")

Alias.name: Construct Firebomb
Alias.script: mtw.al_do_rogue("vout 1 wood with quality < 70;vout naphtha;construct firebomb")

Alias.name: Reload
Alias.command: bqa reload crossbow with bolt;bqa wind crossbow

Alias.name: Shiv with Impatience
Alias.script: mtw.al_do_rogue("envenom dagger with duroxin;shiv "..mtw.target) --add to matawa

Alias.name: Shiv with Epilepsy
Alias.script: mtw.al_do_rogue("envenom dagger with salenin;shiv "..mtw.target) --add to matawa

Alias.name: Shiv with Paralysis
Alias.script: mtw.al_do_rogue("envenom dagger with mortoxis;shiv "..mtw.target) --add to matawa

Alias.name: Lay of the Blessed Isles
Alias.script: mtw.al_do_rogue("Play Lay of the Blessed Isles")

Alias.name: Air of the Black Sorcerer
Alias.script: mtw.al_do_rogue("Play Air of the Black Sorcerer")

Alias.name: Romance of the Elf Queen
Alias.script: mtw.al_do_rogue("Play Romance of the Elf Queen")

Alias.name: Allegro
Alias.script: mtw.al_do_rogue("play allegro "..matches[2]..";bqa play allegro "..matches[3]..";bqa play allegro "..matches[4])

Alias.name: Final Moments
Alias.script: if mtw.skills.warmongering then if matches[2] == "m" then mtw.set_balance("finalmoments "..mtw.target) elseif matches[2] == "r" then mtw.final_moments.withdraw_weapon1 = false mtw.final_moments.run_through1 = true cecho("<yellow>\nFinal moments action: Running Through ON!") elseif matches[2] == "w" then mtw.final_moments.withdraw_weapon1 = true mtw.final_moments.run_through1 = false cecho("<yellow>\nFinal moments action: Withdrawing Weapon ON!") end end

Alias.name: Spirit Brand
Alias.script:
if mtw.skills.warmongering then
local spiritbrandactions = { "t", "w", "a", "m", "s", "d", "r", "c", "h", "" }
for i in ipairs(spiritbrandactions) do if matches[2] == spiritbrandactions[i] then if matches[2] == "t" then mtw.set_balance("tyranny on") elseif matches[2] == "w" then mtw.set_balance("spiritbrand wipe") elseif matches[2] == "m" then mtw.set_balance("miasma") elseif matches[2] == "s" then mtw.set_balance("dragonstare "..mtw.target) elseif matches[2] == "d" then mtw.set_balance("drain "..mtw.target) elseif matches[2] == "r" then mtw.set_balance("spiritbrand release "..mtw.target) elseif matches[2] == "a" then mtw.set_balance("spiritbrand assess") elseif matches[2] == "c" then mtw.set_balance("clanwill") elseif matches[2] == "h" then mtw.set_balance("heatvision on") elseif matches[2] == "" then mtw.set_balance("spiritbrand trace") end end end
end

Alias.name: guardian spirit
Alias.script: mtw.al_do_priest("pray for guardian spirit;bqa order guardian follow "..mtw.target)

Alias.name: Embrace Death (To end Avatar of War)
Zealotry
Alias.script: if table.contains(mtw.skills, "conviction") then if matches[2] == "" then mtw.set_balance("castigate zeal") else mtw.set_balance("castigate zeal "..matches[2]) end end
